ABOUT_ONE: Hello, I am a front-end developer from the cozy town of Gifhorn, Germany. I am passionate about technical innovations and interested in the world of development. So now I am eagerly looking forward to translating this enthusiasm into crafting intuitive and visually engaging front-end solutions.
ABOUT_TWO: Over a year ago, I decided to dive into the world of development and make a professional change in that direction. The Developer Academy greatly assisted me with its highly practical training program.
ABOUT_THREE: In my career in the automotive industry, problem solving has always been an important part of my work and I have always enjoyed it. As this skill is crucial in programming, I'm really looking forward to delving into this subject matter. Shape the digital landscape with me!
PORTFOLIO_DESCRIPTION: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
